document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Akkari, Nesrine & Zapparoli, Marzio
document.masterDocTitle: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
( 6 )
G. flavidus
subsp. escherichii Verh.:
Attems, 1903 b
: 233 .

( 14 )
Clinopodes flavidus
C.L. Koch, 1847
:
Zapparoli, 2002
: 97 , Fig. 43 .

General distribution. Europe: Albania , Austria , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , FYR Macedonia , Greece (incl. Crete), Italy (incl. Sicily, excl. Sardinia), Montenegro , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Ukraine . West Asia: Caucasus, Palestine , Syria , Turkestan, Turkey (
Zapparoli 2002
; Minelli et al. 2006 ).

New records from Mt. Parnonas (
Fig. 13
). 11 ex., Arkadia, Kastanitsa pathway SE to Prastos (loc. 3 ), 1020 m ,

Ecological notes. 0–2400 m ; an euriecious species, in thermophilous and mesothermophilous broadleaved woods, in riparian habitats, in
Abies cephalonica
,
Pinus nigra
and
Fagus sylvatica
forests, under
Ulmus
sp., in
Carpinus
sp.,
Castanea sativa
and
Acer
sp. woods, in Mediterranean phrygana, in coastal habitats, in caves, and in agroecosystems (
Dobroruka 1965
; Zapparoli 1994 , 1996 ,
2002
).
